sentences.en: A client from Greece looks for laser engraver machines to engrave portrait on crystal & opal.
sentences.cn: 希腊客户求购激光雕刻机用于雕刻人像,材料是水晶 和 蛋白石.

sentences.en: Budaoweng has two kinds, one is hydrogrossular, the other is chalcedony opal.
sentences.cn: 不倒翁有两种, 一种为水钙铝榴石玉, 另一种为玉髓蛋白石玉.

sentences.en: Composite opals perfect entry - level opal jewellery and are especially welcomed as gifts.
sentences.cn: 合成欧珀是欧珀首饰绝佳的 低端 产品,作为馈赠礼品,格外受到青睐.

sentences.en: Diving in, the opal seems to splinter into millions of pieces.
sentences.cn: 潜入水下, 蛋白石好像分裂成上百万个碎片.

sentences.en: Exhibiting a milky iridescence like that of an opal.
sentences.cn: 一种红色的蛋白石,有闪烁的变彩小斑.

sentences.en: Green changed to white, emerald to an opal: nothing was changed.
sentences.cn: 绿色倒入杯中,褪为乳白.翡翠抛离光芒, 化为猫眼: 一切如故.

sentences.en: I follow the zigzag footpath , ho , and step on the opal gravel a little rugged.
sentences.cn: 循山径之曲曲兮履琨屑之砾砾 ﹒.

sentences.en: It was a round opal, red and fiery, set in a circle of tiny rubies.
sentences.cn: 那是一块圆形蛋白石,红红的, 象火焰一般, 上面镶着一圈红宝石.

sentences.en: Lonely creeks are opal in the dawn, sword - blue in the sun, greyly silver under misty moons.
sentences.cn: 人迹罕至的溪流在黎明的时候呈乳白色, 在阳光下呈剑蓝色, 而在朦胧的月色下则呈银灰色.

sentences.en: Opal Darkbriar says , Make no mistake, it is just a temporary convenience.
sentences.cn: 不要搞错了, 那只是暂时给你们的方便而已.

sentences.en: Opal diffuser with 70 % optical efficiency provides wide luminance dust and moisture proof easy to clean.
sentences.cn: 透光板采用进口乳白板,防尘,防潮,晚清洁,透光率为70%,照度面广.

sentences.en: Opal paste liquid , It's applicable for vibration brighting and centrifugal grinding for aluminum alloy steel parts.
sentences.cn: 呈乳白色糊液状.适用铝合金、低碳钢等零件的振动光亮和离心研磨光亮等.

sentences.en: She comes up to the top of the tower overlooking Opal Gate.
sentences.cn: 她登上了望蛋白石大门的高塔.

sentences.en: Spirit found the plateau to be surrounded by deposits of opal.
sentences.cn: 勇气号发现高原上有许多蛋白石的沉积物.

sentences.en: When radon gas emitted as springs, very quickly, a phenomenon opal.
sentences.cn: 当氡气随泉水喷出, 速度很快, 便出现乳白现象.

words.tran_cn: 蛋白石的，蛋白石状的；发乳光的；乳白色的
蛋白色光；[光] 乳白光
发出乳白色光，发乳白光
猫眼石，[矿物]蛋白石；乳白玻璃

trans.tran_cn: 蛋白石，猫眼石，乳色玻璃
trans.tran_en: a type of white stone with changing colours in it, often used in jewellery
